item.title: Outreachy experience: Thoughts for future interns.
item.description: I am working on enhancing the Kubernetes developer guide as an Outreachy intern, which consists of creating a guide that can be easily found, and logically organized. It is aimed at code contributors that want to improve the kubernetes functionality or fix bugs. One of the main goals is that new and existing contributors can have a good grasp of the whole course of making changes or improvements to the code after reading the guide.
